metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart comments on the flower offering.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1.Offer flower on grave at 24; 41; 13 while shadowheart is there

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: A small remembrance... from one who can scarcely remember. Rest well.
0.context: NodeContext: Brief dedication upon offering a flower to the grave of someone she feels sorrow for, but doesn't quite remember.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: My favourite flower. Just a small remembrance... from one who can scarcely remember. Rest well.
1.context: NodeContext: Brief dedication upon offering a flower (her favourite kind)  to the grave of someone she feels sorrow for, but doesn't quite remember.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: My favourite. A kind touch, thank you.
2.context: NodeContext: Appreciative. Player laid a flower on the grave of a stranger that SH feels inexplicably mournful for. It's her favourite type of flower, also.

3.speaker: Shadowheart
